title: WTB: These Reds with EPDG Back
author: Cmvorce

posts.post_title: WTB: These Reds with EPDG Back
posts.post_content:
I’m desperately looking for one of the following Reds in an EPDG back:

Jean Dubuc
Harry Gasper
Larry McLean
Dick Hoblitzell 

Looking for lower grade. Raw preferred but slabbed in a 1-2 is fine as well. Please let me know if you have anything for sale. Could also trade an SGC 1.5 Bob Spade EPDG if interested. Help me finish my Reds team set! Thank you 

Chris
